properties.sql_select_statement: SELECT movies.movieId AS "id", movies.movieId as "movieId", TITLE AS "title", GENRES AS "genres", 'https://www.imdb.com/title/tt00' || CAST(imdbId AS CHAR(10)) AS "url", tmdbId AS "tmdbId" FROM movies INNER JOIN links ON movies.movieId = links.movieId
nested_queries: SELECT userId as "userId", rating as "rating" FROM ratings WHERE CAST(ratings.movieId AS CHAR(7)) = $
